TopicTitle: Trying to find a specific type of skybox, looking for suggestions

Articles.Content:
I'm trying to find a specific type of skybox, one that:

  • Doesn't contain the Milky Way or the stars as we see them from Earth
  • Is somewhat dim, with no large bright/saturated nebulae. (closer to how our eyes would see things)

If anyone knows of any skyboxes that would work please let me know.

Thank you very much
